title: Sam Gowland covers his tattoo of ex-girlfriend Chloe Ferry's face with a HUGE bear inking
text:
Their relationship came crashing to an end when she dumped him after accusing him cheating with Love Island beauty Amber Davies.

And Sam Gowland proved that he's moved on from ex-girlfriend Chloe Ferry for good as he had her face tattoo on his leg covered up.

Taking to Instagram on Thursday, the reality star, 24, showed off his new inking of a very large bear on his thigh in a video, captioning it: 'Cover up on thigh, leg sleeve pending.'

Moving on: Sam Gowland proved that he's moved on from ex-girlfriend Chloe Ferry for good as he had her face tattoo on his leg covered up

The large tattoo covered the previous one of Chloe's face, which he obtained when the duo appeared on MTV show Just Tattoo Of Us in November last year.

At the time, the star was furious with his 23-year-old ex, exclaiming: 'Why the f**k did you do that for?'

While Chloe, who initially picked the design so she could c**k block her partner, admitted some regret about her choice adding: 'I am regretting it a little bit now.

'I didn't think it would be that big!'

However, the tattoo is no longer a problem for Sam as he now sports a huge inking of a roaring bear on his leg.

He also took to Instagram stories to share the process of the inking, showing off the initial designs and inspiration picture, alongside the former design.

His latest move comes just days after he delivered a further snub to the Geordie Shore beauty after cropping her out of a throwback snap.

The former Love Island star shared a snap of himself at a UFC fight in Las Vegas last year, but brutally cropped out his on-off lover.

Awkwardly, Sam's haphazard editing skills meant that Chloe's arms were still seen draped around his neck in the snap.

Chloe and Sam split earlier this year, but they sparked speculation of a reunion last month after they were spotted at an airport together boarding a flight to Dubai.

Things turned bitter between the pair when Chloe took to Instagram to accuse him of having sex with Amber Davies, which both deny.

The star shared alleged messages between her ex Sam and Amber which she claims proves they had sex, despite the pair's denials.

Amber then took to Instagram to deny sleeping with Sam, and gave an explanation for the messages shared.

She wrote: 'A couple of weeks ago Sam replied to one of my Instagram stories and I ignored him after the whole drama. He then went on to message me saying that he hoped the whole situation hadn't ruined our friendship because it was quite frankly ridiculous.'

She then posted another statement in which she wrote: 'It was in fact someone from Chloe's side trying to sell this story in the first place. The last story of mine is facts.

'For Chloe to take to her 3m+ followers.. assume manipulate and take everything out of context even after her and I exchanging messages and me reassuring her that nothing had happened is shocking.'

Amber's words come after Chloe took to her Instagram Stories to share a slew of videos where she accused Sam of cheating on her.

The star claimed she found messages on her laptop between Sam and another woman, and went onto say she first heard that Sam and Amber had slept together a day after they split up.

Amber then took to social media to fiercely deny the claims, insisting she and Sam are nothing more than friends.
description: The reality star, 24, proved that he's moved on from ex-girlfriend Chloe Ferry, 23, for good as he had her face tattoo on his leg covered up on Thursday.
